summary: To make a payment using the Discover Mobile App, you can follow these steps: 1. Log in to the Discover Mobile App. 2. Select the Payments icon. 3. Select Manage Bank Accounts. 4. Locate the bank account that you want to change. 5. Click Edit or Delete. 6. Follow the remaining steps.
If you have a damaged card, you can contact your bank to request a replacement. They may offer to send a replacement if you can't read the expiration date due to a faded card.
